original_text: but you shall open your hand to him and lend him sufficient for his need, whatever it may be.
korean_text: 반드시 네 손을 그에게 펴서 그에게 필요한 대로 쓸 것을 넉넉히 꾸어주라

sentences.original_text: but you shall open your hand to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그에게 손을 펴야 하며

sentences.original_text: and lend him sufficient for his need
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 필요에 맞게 충분히 빌려주어야 하고
